#include <string.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <queue>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <set>
#include <stdlib.h>

#define ll long long
using namespace std;
const int N=2e5+9,mod=1e9+7;

int main()
{
	int c;
	cin>>c;
	while(c--)
	{
		ll n,k,m;
		scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&k,&m);
		if(k==1) 
		{
			printf("%lld\n",n);
			continue;
		}
		while(m)
		{
			if(n%k!=0) break;
			m--;
			n/=k;
		}
		if(m&1) n*=k;
		printf("%lld\n",n);
	}

	return 0;
}
